changeSet.author: Mbarek
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE crm_custom_field_tmpl DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS uk_odjxv76fr14lrm19mt961b04p;

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_TMPL set storage_type='SINGLE' where storage_type is null;

changeSet.author: EdwardLegaspi
changeSet.sql: UPDATE crm_provider SET credit_note_sequence_size=9;

changeSet.author: EdwardLegaspi
changeSet.sql: UPDATE billing_invoice SET invoice_type='COMMERCIAL'

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: insert into adm_role (id, version, role_name, role_description, provider_id) (select nextval('adm_role_seq'), 0, 'ModifyAllCE', 'Modify all custom entities', crm_provider.id from crm_provider)
insert into adm_role (id, version, role_name, role_description, provider_id) (select nextval('adm_role_seq'), 0, 'ReadAllCE', 'Read all custom entities', crm_provider.id from crm_provider)

insert into adm_role_role (role_id, child_role_id) (select role_p.id, role_c.id from adm_role role_p join adm_role role_c on role_p.provider_id=role_c.provider_id and role_p.role_name='administrateur' and role_c.role_name='ModifyAllCE')

insert into adm_role_role (role_id, child_role_id) (select role_p.id, role_c.id from adm_role role_p join adm_role role_c on role_p.provider_id=role_c.provider_id and role_p.role_name='ModifyAllCE' and role_c.role_name='ReadAllCE')

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_TMPL set max_value=50 where max_value is null and field_type='STRING'

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_INST set APPLIES_TO_UUID =cff_id
update CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_INST set provider_id=(select provider_id from crm_custom_field_fields where crm_custom_field_fields.id =CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_INST.cff_id)
update MEDINA_ACCESS set UUID =cff_id where cff_id is not null
update CRM_PROVIDER set UUID =cff_id where cff_id is not null
update ACCOUNT_ENTITY set UUID =cff_id where cff_id is not null
update CAT_CHARGE_TEMPLATE set UUID =cff_id where cff_id is not null
update MEVEO_JOB_INSTANCE set UUID =cff_id where cff_id is not null
update CAT_OFFER_TEMPLATE set UUID =cff_id where cff_id is not null
update CRM_SELLER set UUID =cff_id where cff_id is not null
update CAT_SERVICE_TEMPLATE set UUID =cff_id where cff_id is not null
update BILLING_SUBSCRIPTION set UUID =cff_id where cff_id is not null
update CUST_CEI set UUID =cff_id where cff_id is not null
update MEDINA_ACCESS set UUID =nextval('CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_FIELDS_SEQ') where uuid is null
update CRM_PROVIDER set UUID =nextval('CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_FIELDS_SEQ') where uuid is null
update ACCOUNT_ENTITY set UUID =nextval('CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_FIELDS_SEQ') where uuid is null
update CAT_CHARGE_TEMPLATE set UUID =nextval('CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_FIELDS_SEQ') where uuid is null
update MEVEO_JOB_INSTANCE set UUID =nextval('CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_FIELDS_SEQ') where uuid is null
update CAT_OFFER_TEMPLATE set UUID =nextval('CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_FIELDS_SEQ') where uuid is null
update CRM_SELLER set UUID =nextval('CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_FIELDS_SEQ') where uuid is null
update CAT_SERVICE_TEMPLATE set UUID =nextval('CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_FIELDS_SEQ') where uuid is null
update BILLING_SUBSCRIPTION set UUID =nextval('CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_FIELDS_SEQ') where uuid is null
update CUST_CEI set UUID =nextval('CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_FIELDS_SEQ') where uuid is null

insert into CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_INST (id, version, provider_id, APPLIES_TO_UUID, disabled, created, updated, code, date_value, double_value, long_value, string_value, creator_id, updater_id, serialized_value, priority, period_end_date, period_start_date) (select nextval('crm_custom_field_inst_seq'), 0, cfi.provider_id, cfi.APPLIES_TO_UUID, cfi.disabled, cfi.created, cfi.updated, cfi.code, cfp.date_value, cfp.double_value, cfp.long_value, cfp.string_value, cfi.creator_id, cfi.updater_id, cfp.serialized_value, cfp.priority, cfp.period_end_date, cfp.period_start_date from crm_custom_field_inst cfi join crm_custom_field_period cfp on cfi.id=cfp.cf_instance_id)
delete from CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_INST where id in (select cf_instance_id from crm_custom_field_period)

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
AndriusKarpavicius
AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_TMPL set MAPKEY_TYPE='STRING' where storage_type='MAP'

changeSet.author: EdwardLegaspi
changeSet.sql: UPDATE cat_offer_template SET name=DESCRIPTION;

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update MEVEO_SCRIPT_INSTANCE set SCRIPT_TYPE='ScriptInstance'

changeSet.author: EdwardLegaspi
changeSet.sql: UPDATE cat_offer_template_category SET level=1;

changeSet.author: anasseh
changeSet.sql: UPDATE CAT_CHARGE_TEMPLATE SET ROUNDING_MODE='NEAREST';

changeSet.author: smichea
changeSet.sql: UPDATE DWH_CHART SET WIDTH='500px';

changeSet.author: smichea
changeSet.sql: UPDATE DWH_CHART SET HEIGHT='300px';

changeSet.author: smichea
changeSet.sql: UPDATE dwh_measurable_quant SET additive=TRUE;

changeSet.author: smichea
changeSet.sql: UPDATE DWH_MEASURED_VALUE SET CODE = (SELECT CODE FROM dwh_measurable_quant WHERE dwh_measurable_quant.id=DWH_MEASURED_VALUE.MEASURABLE_QUANTITY)
UPDATE dwh_measurable_quant SET VISIBLE=TRUE;

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update cat_offer_serv_templates set id=offer_template_id, version=0
update cat_offer_serv_templates set provider_id = (select provider_id from cat_offer_template where cat_offer_template.id=cat_offer_serv_templates.offer_template_id)

update cat_offer_serv_templates set id = (select nextval('CAT_OFFER_SERV_TEMPLT_SEQ') from cat_offer_serv_templates as oo where oo.offer_template_id=cat_offer_serv_templates.offer_template_id and oo.service_template_id=cat_offer_serv_templates.service_template_id)
delete from cat_offer_serv_incomp

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update MEVEO_MODULE_ITEM set ITEM_TYPE='org.meveo.model.customEntities.CustomEntityTemplate' where ITEM_TYPE='CET'
update MEVEO_MODULE_ITEM set ITEM_TYPE='org.meveo.model.crm.CustomFieldTemplate' where ITEM_TYPE='CFT'
update MEVEO_MODULE_ITEM set ITEM_TYPE='org.meveo.model.filter.Filter' where ITEM_TYPE='FILTER'
update MEVEO_MODULE_ITEM set ITEM_TYPE='org.meveo.model.scripts.ScriptInstance' where ITEM_TYPE='SCRIPT'
update MEVEO_MODULE_ITEM set ITEM_TYPE='org.meveo.model.jobs.JobInstance' where ITEM_TYPE='JOBINSTANCE'
update MEVEO_MODULE_ITEM set ITEM_TYPE='org.meveo.model.notification.Notification' where ITEM_TYPE='NOTIFICATION'
update MEVEO_MODULE_ITEM set ITEM_TYPE='org.meveo.model.module.MeveoModule' where ITEM_TYPE='SUBMODULE'
update MEVEO_MODULE_ITEM set ITEM_TYPE='org.meveocrm.model.dwh.MeasurableQuantity' where ITEM_TYPE='MEASURABLEQUANTITIES'
update MEVEO_MODULE_ITEM set ITEM_TYPE='org.meveocrm.model.dwh.Chart' where ITEM_TYPE='CHART'

changeSet.sql: update BILLING_SERVICE_INSTANCE set UUID ='ServiceInstance-'|| id

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update MEVEO_JOB_INSTANCE set disabled=not(active)

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update crm_custom_field_tmpl tm set provider_id = (select provider_id from adm_user where id = tm.creator_id) where tm.provider_id is null;

changeSet.author: anasseh
changeSet.sql: update BILLING_INVOICE set UUID ='Invoice-'|| id
update BILLING_INVOICE_CAT set UUID ='InvoiceCategory-'|| id
update BILLING_INVOICE_SUB_CAT set UUID ='InvoiceSubCategory-'|| id
update AR_ACCOUNT_OPERATION set UUID ='AccountOperation-'|| id

AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update meveo_module set script_instance_id=(select script_instance_id from cat_business_offer_model where meveo_module.id=cat_business_offer_model.id)
update meveo_module set script_instance_id=(select script_instance_id from cat_business_serv_model where meveo_module.id=cat_business_serv_model.id)
update meveo_module set script_instance_id=(select script_instance_id from crm_business_account_model where meveo_module.id=crm_business_account_model.id)
update meveo_module set installed=false

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: insert into crm_custom_action (id, version, disabled, created, updated, provider_id, creator_id, updater_id, code, description, applies_to, applicable_on_el, label, script_instance_id) (select nextval('crm_custom_action_seq'), version, disabled, created, updated, provider_id, creator_id, updater_id, code, description, applies_to, applicable_on_el, label, id from meveo_script_instance where script_type='EntityAction' )
